divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife had gotten a phone call from her sister in law saying there was a UFO sighting from several people saying it was headed to our town as soon as we heard that we rushed out side I got out first she came out about 10 minutes after me I saw a craft headed from were they saw it I seen it coming it passed over my town my wife came out right after it passed over but about another 10 minutes after the craft passed over she got to see the 6 disc flying over all in uniform they had no lights and no sound flying about 500' over us I was scared and felt invaded I didn't know what to do or who to contact about this a short while after we saw this people in a small town on the west side of us saw a UFO sighting it was in our local TV news that night I'll take a lie detector test if I have to my wife witnessed it and several people it was amazing to experience The disc that you show on the top right side of your web site looked just like what we saw
Summary: 6 disc flying in uniform side by side
